00044 namespace wave {
00045   namespace detail { // anonymous 
00046     template<typename T>
00047     T readT(std::istream& is) {
00048       T data;
00049       is.read((char *)(&data), sizeof(T));
00050       if (!is) throw std::runtime_error("read failed");
00051       return data;
00052     }
00053     chunk::header read_header(std::istream& is) {
00054       const std::streampos pos(is.tellg());
00055       const chunk::header header(readT<chunk::header>(is));
00056       is.seekg(pos);
00057       return header;
00058     }
00059     double read_real_sample(std::istream& is,
00060                             size_t bits_per_sample) {
00061       boost::uint8_t a(0);
00062       boost::int32_t sum(0);
00063       for (size_t u(0); u<bits_per_sample; u+=8) 
00064         sum |= ((a=readT<boost::uint8_t>(is)) << u);
00065       const boost::int32_t i_max(1L << bits_per_sample);
00066       const double norm(2. / static_cast<double>(i_max));
00067       return ( ((a&0x80) == 0x80) ? sum-i_max : sum) * norm;
00068     }    
00069 
00070     template<typename T>
00071     std::pair<T, double> read_real_sample(T i, size_t bits_per_sample) {
00072       boost::uint8_t a(0);
00073       boost::int32_t sum(0);
00074       for (size_t u(0); u<bits_per_sample; u+=8) 
00075         sum |= ((a=boost::uint8_t(*i++)) << u);
00076       const boost::int32_t i_max(1L << bits_per_sample);
00077       const double norm(2. / static_cast<double>(i_max));
00078       return std::make_pair(i, ( ((a&0x80) == 0x80) ? sum-i_max : sum) * norm);
00079     }

00091       }

00095       virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number()       const { return 1; }
00096       virtual std::string     stream_name()         const { return stream_name_; }      
00097       virtual boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz()      const { return format_.sampleRate(); }

00123   template<typename PROCESSOR>
00124   class reader_iq_base : public processor::base_iq {
00125   public:
00126     typedef boost::shared_ptr<reader_iq_base> sptr;
00127 
00128     reader_iq_base(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00129       : base_iq(config)
00130       , p_(config)
00131       , read_riff_(false)
00132       , read_format_(false)
00133       , read_data_(false)
00134       , buffer_length_sec_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.buffer_length_sec", 1.0))
00135       , overlap_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.overlap", 0.0))
00136       , iq_buffer_(0, 0.)
00137       , sample_number_(0) {}
00138     virtual ~reader_iq_base() {}
00139 
00140     bool process_file(std::string filename) {
00141       std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str());
00142       start_time_ = boost::posix_time::from_time_t(boost::filesystem::last_write_time(filename));
00143       return read_chunks(ifs);
00144     }
00145     void finish() {
00146       // insert one last dummy sample to trigger processing of left over data
00147       iq_buffer_.insert(this, std::complex<double>(0, 0));
00148     }
00149 
00150     // complex_vector_type samples() const { return iq_buffer_.samples(); }
00151     
00152     void procIQ(const_iterator i0,
00153                 const_iterator i1) {
00154       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00155       p_.process_iq(get_service(std::distance(i0, i1)), i0, i1);
00156       start_time_ += time_duration(0, 0, 0,
00157                                    boost::int64_t(double(std::distance(i0, i1))
00158                                                   /double(format_.sampleRate())
00159                                                   *time_duration::ticks_per_second()+0.5));
00160     }
00161 
00162     void process_iq(service::sptr service,
00163                     const_iterator i0, 
00164                     const_iterator i1) { }
00165 
00166   protected:
00167     const chunk::format& format() const { return format_; }
00168     ptime start_time() const { return start_time_; }
00169     void update_start_time(ptime t) { start_time_ = t; }
00170     boost::int64_t sample_number() const { return sample_number_; }
00171 
00172     virtual service::sptr get_service(size_t number_of_samples) const = 0;
00173 
00174     virtual void reset() {
00175       read_riff_   = false;
00176       read_format_ = false;
00177       read_data_   = false;
00178     }
00179 
00180     bool read_chunks(std::istream& is) {
00181       reset();
00182       riff_      = detail::readT<chunk::riff>(is);
00183       read_riff_ = true;
00184       std::cout << riff_ << std::endl;
00185       if (!riff_.ok()) return false;
00186       while (is && is.tellg() < int(sizeof(chunk::header)+riff_.size())) {
00187         const chunk::header h(detail::read_header(is));
00188         if (h.id() == "fmt ") {
00189           format_      = detail::readT<chunk::format>(is);
00190           read_format_ = true;
00191           std::cout << format_ << std::endl;
00192           iq_buffer_.update(size_t(format_.sampleRate()*buffer_length_sec_+0.5), overlap_);
00193         } else if (h.id() == "data") {
00194           data_      = detail::readT<chunk::data>(is);
00195           read_data_ = true;
00196           std::cout << data_ << std::endl;
00197           // process data here:
00198           // is.seekg(h.size(), std::ios_base::cur);
00199           for (size_t i=0; i<h.size(); i+=format_.bytesPerSample()) {
00200             const double xi(detail::read_real_sample(is, format_.bitsPerSample())); // real
00201             const double xq(detail::read_real_sample(is, format_.bitsPerSample())); // imag
00202             iq_buffer_.insert(this, std::complex<double>(xi, xq));
00203             ++sample_number_;
00204           }
00205         } else if (read_chunk(h, is)) {
00206           // further types of chunks can be read in a derived class
00207         } else {
00208           std::cout << "unknown subchunk '"<< h.id()
00209                     << "' skipping "<< sizeof(chunk::header)+h.size() << " bytes"
00210                     << std::endl;
00211           is.seekg(sizeof(chunk::header)+h.size(), std::ios_base::cur);
00212         }
00213       }
00214       return chunks_ok();
00215     }
00216     // to be overwritten in derived classes
00217     virtual bool read_chunk(const chunk::header& h,
00218                             std::istream& is) { 
00219       return false;
00220     }
00221 
00222     virtual bool chunks_ok() const { 
00223       return (   read_riff_   && riff_.ok()
00224               && read_format_ && format_.ok()
00225               && read_data_   && data_.ok());
00226     }
00227 
00228   private:
00229     PROCESSOR p_;
00230     bool read_riff_;
00231     bool read_format_;
00232     bool read_data_;
00233 
00234     chunk::riff   riff_;
00235     chunk::format format_;
00236     chunk::data   data_;
00237 
00238     double buffer_length_sec_;
00239     double overlap_;
00240     IQBuffer iq_buffer_;
00241 
00242     ptime start_time_; // current start time
00243     boost::int64_t sample_number_; // current sample number
00244   } ;

00246   template<typename PROCESSOR>
00247   class reader_iq : public reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR> {
00248   public:
00249     reader_iq(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00250       : reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>(config)
00251       , center_freq_hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.center_freq_Hz", 0.0)) {
00252       update_start_time(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::universal_time());
00253     }    
00254     virtual ~reader_iq() {}
00255 
00256     typedef typename reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::service service;
00257     using reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::get_service;
00258     using reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::format;
00259     using reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::start_time;
00260     using reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::update_start_time;
00261 
00262     virtual typename service::sptr get_service(size_t number_of_samples) const {
00263       return detail::service_wave_iq::make(start_time(),
00264                                            "name",
00265                                            center_freq_hz_,
00266                                            format());                                           
00267     }

00295     virtual processor::service_base::sptr get_service(size_t number_of_samples) const {
00296       const protocol::perseus::header h(sample_number(),
00297                                         format().sampleRate(),
00298                                         rcvr_.nCenterFrequencyHz(),
00299                                         number_of_samples,
00300                                         rcvr().nSamplingRateIdx(),
00301                                         rcvr().wAttenId(),
00302                                         rcvr().bAdcPresel(),
00303                                         rcvr().bAdcPreamp(),
00304                                         rcvr().bAdcDither());

00306     }

00308   protected:
00309     virtual void reset() {
00310       reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::reset();
00311       read_rcvr_ = false;
00312     }
00313     virtual bool read_chunk(const chunk::header& h,
00314                             std::istream& is) { 
00315       if (h.id() != "rcvr")
00316         return false;
00317       rcvr_       = detail::readT<chunk::rcvr>(is);
00318       read_rcvr_  = true;
00319       update_start_time(rcvr_.ptimeStart());
00320       return rcvr_.ok();
00321     }
00322     virtual bool chunks_ok() const {
00323       return reader_iq_base<PROCESSOR>::chunks_ok() && read_rcvr_ && rcvr_.ok();
00324     }
00325     const chunk::rcvr rcvr() const { return rcvr_; }
00326   private:
00327     bool read_rcvr_;
00328     chunk::rcvr rcvr_;
00329   } ;
